      • register

        public User register(String psw,
                     String nick)
        Attempts to register a new user by adding a new entry to the user database.
        Parameters:
        psw - the password passed to be processed
        nick - the username picked by the user
        Returns:
        the User object of the newly registered user

      • login

        public User login(String psw,
                  String nick)
        Attempts to log in a new user by adding a new entry to the user database.
        Parameters:
        psw -
        nick -
        Returns:
        the User object of the newly logged in user

      • isUserRegistered

        public boolean isUserRegistered(String nick)
        Check if a user with a given name is already registered or not.
        Parameters:
        nick - the username to be checked
        Returns:
        boolean value of true if such user already exists, false if not

      • clearViews

        public void clearViews()
        Clears the views created in the database.

      • updateViews

        public boolean updateViews()
                    throws InterruptedException
        Updates views in the database
        Returns:
        true after finished
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if thread is interrupted

      • HashPSW

        public String HashPSW(String init)
               throws InvalidKeySpecException,
                      NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Creates a hash (immutable code impossible to un-hash) of a given String, used for password protection when storing in database.
        Parameters:
        init - the String to be hashed
        Returns:
        the hashed product of the method
        Throws:
        InvalidKeySpecException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • rateMovie

        public void rateMovie(double rate,
                      int id_movie,
                      User user)
        Passes information about movie rating to the database.
        Parameters:
        rate - the value of the rating (standard values 1 to 5)
        id_movie - the unique id of the movie being rated
        user - the user that rated the movie

      • updatePerson

        public void updatePerson(String name,
                         String surname,
                         String year,
                         String desc,
                         int id,
                         char Who)
        Updates a given Person object in the database according to passed parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - the updated name of the Person object
        surname - the updated surname of the Person object
        year - the updated year of birth of the Person object
        desc - the updated description of the Person object
        id - the unique id of the person being updated
        Who - a supporting parameter determining whether to update the actor table (case 'A'), the director table (case 'D') or the scenarist table (case 'S')

      • insertPerson

        public void insertPerson(String name,
                         String surname,
                         String year,
                         String desc,
                         int id,
                         char Who)
        Inserts a given Person object in the database according to passed parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - the updated name of the Person object
        surname - the updated surname of the Person object
        year - the updated year of birth of the Person object
        desc - the updated description of the Person object
        id - the unique id of the person being updated
        Who - a supporting parameter determining whether to update the actor table (case 'A'), the director table (case 'D') or the scenarist table (case 'S')

      • inserMovie

        public void inserMovie(int id,
                       String nameCZ,
                       String nameEN,
                       String year,
                       String desc,
                       int[] actors,
                       int[] directors,
                       int[] scenarists)

      • updateMovie

        public void updateMovie(Movie movie,
                        ArrayList<Integer> addActors,
                        ArrayList<Integer> addDirectors,
                        ArrayList<Integer> addScenarists,
                        ArrayList<Integer> rmActors,
                        ArrayList<Integer> rmDirectors,
                        ArrayList<Integer> rmScenarists)
        Updates a given Movie in database according to given parameters.
        Parameters:
        movie - the movie to be updated, containing the basic information about the movie, such as name, year of first screening, etc.
        addActors - ArrayList of integer IDs referencing actors to be added to the movie.
        addDirectors - ArrayList of integer IDs referencing directors to be added to the movie.
        addScenarists - ArrayList of integer IDs referencing scenarists to be added to the movie.
        rmActors - ArrayList of integer IDs referencing actors to be removed to the movie.
        rmDirectors - ArrayList of integer IDs referencing directors to be removed to the movie.
        rmScenarists - ArrayList of integer IDs referencing scenarists to be removed to the movie.
